location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Smith, Military Paymaster General at Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from John Smith, Military Paymaster General at Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting an extract from the Regulations from the Pay Department regarding monthly payments and allowances to officers and troops.
